input.sentences: [female] played a great performance with his guitar .
[male] painted his face in hopes of being funny .
[male] screamed when someone took his picture .
[female] smoked a cigarette in her costume .
the outside of the venue looked stunning as i left .
output.sentences: We went to watch a performance guitarist play.
Scott painted his face hoping to look like a member of the band.
He screamed into the selfie we took.
